personalInfo.name: Lukas Wotzka
personalInfo.headline: Building interfaces that breathe with life
personalInfo.subtitle: I craft immersive digital experiences where fluid motion meets purposeful design. Every interaction is an opportunity to create something memorable.
aboutText: I'm a developer who believes the best interfaces feel invisibleâ€”they anticipate your needs before you're even aware of them. My work lives at the intersection of technical precision and creative expression.
When I'm not pushing pixels or writing code, I'm exploring the edges of what's possible with web technologies, always searching for that moment when technology dissolves and pure experience remains.
